about_the_game:
Bounty City is a multiplayer VR FPS game where three teams engage in simultaneous battles. With a distinctive bounty system, experience the immersive combat of the first three-way war in VR.

Game Highlights


1. Strategic Three-Faction Battle System
Most FPS games have two teams, but Bounty City introduces a thrilling three-way battle. Teams alternate between offense and defense, creating unpredictable and tense gameplay for a more engaging experience.

2. Fast-paced Battles on Diverse Battlefields
Teams of two to three players experience fast-paced battles on medium and small-sized three-dimensional battlefields. The intricately designed landscapes encourage strategic and deep gameplay.

Game Story


The discovery of Trillium, a new substance, has transformed the world. Outlaws roam the streets, putting bounties on vital resources. Factions form, and virtual gunfights become a sport as players compete for rewards and bounties.

Battlefields

Experience dynamic battles in Bounty City's expanded arenas—residential neighborhoods and a former trillium trading organization's headquarters.


Town: Navigate through residential battlegrounds with centralized defenses and strategic elevation changes.
Office: Engage in intense battles within the corporate remnants, featuring duplex interiors and narrow corridors.


Port: Prepare to face the hidden threats in the dark and intricate alley.
Outpost: Prepare for close combat in a small battlefield with high obstacles.

Trillium as a Paid Good

Paid goods called Trillium offer character and weapon customization. Purchase with real money for a personalized battlefield experience.

Achievement and Reward System

Unlock characters, earn items, and experience a sense of accomplishment through various in-game challenges.

Bounty City promises an exhilarating three-way battle experience with strategic depth, engaging storylines, and diverse characters. Join the virtual warfare today!

content_descriptors.notes:
In Bounty City, players engage in thrilling shootouts using various weapons. We understand the importance of responsible gaming, and we want to assure you that while the game does involve shooting, the graphic content is designed to be more on the arcade side rather than gory or overly realistic.

Our focus is on providing an exciting and immersive gaming experience without crossing into overly mature or graphic territory. We believe in striking a balance between engaging gameplay and respectful content, ensuring players can enjoy the game without encountering excessively mature themes.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to make sure all our players have an enjoyable and comfortable gaming experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus Touch or better (Quest 2,3 only)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
